Detailed Description

Camera class - Plentoon Games Stores the camera position and look at vector Calculates the movement and rotation

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

Camera::Camera (  ) 

Ctor Set the spd with dt variables to 0.0 Set the initial cam pos to default pos bool variables set to false as default

void Camera::CheckCamera (  ) 

Check whether the camera is moving or not If is moving, move to the next position If isn't, reset the move vector to zero
